content: **knitted mittens in drops alpaca bouclé and drops brushed alpaca silk the piece is worked in stocking stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **sizes ** s/m - m/l - l/xl circumference 17-18-19 cm length 23-24-26 cm **yarn ** drops alpaca bouclé from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50-50-50 g colour 0602 brown and use drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 25-25-25 g colour 05 beige **needles ** drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need an 80 cm circular needle **knitting gauge ** 15 stitches in width and 19 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality on needle size 4 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size drops 261-61 #frostedbarkmittens drops design pattern ab-175 yarn group c + c or e
